title: Feliz Navidad, Carlos!
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 339 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 530L, Fiction Series
description: Carlos and his family are returning to Mexico to celebrate Navidad. When they arrive, they participate in Las Posadas. They walk through the neighborhood knocking on doors and singing carols until they locate the fiesta. At midnight, they attend church together. Students will have the opportunity to sequence events and compare their winter holiday celebrations to Carlos's as they read this book.
reviewWords: Bethlehem, celebration, fiesta, flicker, journey, Las Posadas
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Place words in alphabetical order
